pullRequest.title: fix: Increase item pickup range
pullRequest.bodyText: The code for extending item pickup range beyond the character collider was already present, but was broken accidentally in #3907, so this requires very little change.

commit.message:
Increase item pickup range.

The code for extending item pickup range beyond the character collider
was already present, but was broken accidentally a while ago, so this
requires very little change.

nodes.bodyText:
Hm, I'm wondering whether this additional shape can be derived from the collider (to keep them in sync).
If it is a "special" shape just for item pickup, maybe this should be part of some better-named component?

Additional question: where is the character collider shape programmatically set? I see that in https://github.com/MovingBlocks/Terasology/blob/develop/engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/physics/bullet/BulletPhysics.java#L491-L505 the character collider is created with values taken from the CharacterMovementComponent.
How can we keep a single source of truth for the (base) values?
